profile.summary: I am a dynamic and detail-oriented full-stack developer with over a decade of experience in developing and maintaining web and desktop applications. Proficient in a range of programming languages and frameworks with a strong focus on .NET technologies. Adept at working in fast-paced environments and committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet business needs.

skills.group: ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, .NET Core
SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

experience.description: Engaged in full-stack development with a focus on ASP.NET Core Web API and Angular. Maintained GitLab CI/CD pipelines, worked with Oracle database, and implemented unit tests. Utilized agile Scrum methodologies.
Developed websites from scratch using Razor and JQuery. Maintained ASP MVC applications and Azure SQL database. Gained experience with Power Automate, IIS, and cloud environments.

Maintained desktop ERP systems and ASP MVC applications in C#. Developed Power BI projects with PostgreSQL and Azure databases. Integrated ETL with Talend and Data Factory. Practiced Kanban methodology.

Developed various desktop applications using VB.NET and managed MS SQL databases. Focused on data capture tools and billing document printouts. Provided support and maintenance for all developed applications.

Started as an assistant, gradually took on more responsibilities including data analysis and billing document management. Developed a collection management application using VBA and MS Access, later migrating to VB.NET and SQL database.

certification.course: .NET Microservices: CQRS & Event Sourcing with Kafka
certification.description: For a new project at work, I wanted to learn more about Kafka and Docker applied to a .NET project. Learning more about CQRS & Event Sourcing was a plus and a great experience.
I had just started working with agile methodologies and wanted to learn more about Scrum. This course was a great introduction.
I have been working with ASP.NET MVC for a while, but I wanted to learn more about the framework and how to improve my skills.
I had never worked with unit testing before and wanted to learn more about it.
I had just started working with SQL Server and needed to learn more so I could work with the database.
I did not have any experience with programming and needed to learn the basics to be able to develop a custom system for the company.
